ChatShelf - Your ChatGPT Assistant

ğŸŒŸ Key Features ğŸŒŸ

1ï¸âƒ£  Auto-Sync: Seamlessly transfer ChatGPT conversations to your personal knowledge base, starting with Notion.
2ï¸âƒ£  Notion Compatibility: Perfectly transform ChatGPT text into Notion Blocks, from headers to code.
3ï¸âƒ£  History Trace: Never lose a ChatGPT conversation. ChatShelf archives every interaction.
4ï¸âƒ£  Content Management: Copy as Markdown or formatted text.
5ï¸âƒ£  Privacy First: Encrypted storage ensures only you access your conversations.
Multi-Platform: Beyond Chrome, beyond ChatGPT, beyond Notion.

ğŸŒŸ Follow Us ğŸŒŸ

âºï¸ Twitter: https://twitter.com/chatshelf
âºï¸ Google Group: https://groups.google.com/g/chatshelf
âºï¸ Email: support@shelf.chat

ğŸŒŸ Overview ğŸŒŸ

ChatShelf is a synchronization tool tailored for ChatGPT users, designed to efficiently capture, manage, and repurpose ChatGPT conversations.

With ChatShelf, never miss out on valuable insights from your AI interactions!
